title: Fix TUI widget component tests
description:
**As a** Consoul developer
**I want** TUI widget tests to pass
**So that** we can ensure all UI components work correctly

**Context:**
Approximately 70 tests across multiple TUI widget test files are failing. These widgets are core to the Textual-based UI and include attachment handling, chat display, conversation lists, file selection, and input areas.

**Technical Notes:**
- tests/tui/widgets/*.py - Widget test files
- src/consoul/tui/widgets/*.py - Widget implementations
- Textual framework - async widget testing

**Failing Test Groups:**
1. Attachment widgets (14 failures)
   - test_attachment_button.py
   - File selection and modal integration
2. ChatView tests (8 failures)
   - test_chat_view.py
   - Message display and scrolling
3. ConversationList tests (17 failures)
   - test_conversation_list.py
   - Database loading and search
4. FileAttachmentModal tests (17 failures)
   - test_file_attachment_modal.py
   - File browser and selection
5. FileChip tests (23 failures)
   - test_file_chip.py
   - File metadata display
6. InputArea tests (11 failures)
   - test_input_area.py
   - Message input and submission
7. MessageBubble tests (1 failure)
   - test_message_bubble.py
   - Message rendering
8. ToolCallWidget tests (3 failures)
   - test_tool_call_widget.py
   - Tool execution display

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** each widget is tested in isolation
**When** async operations complete
**Then** all assertions should pass

**Testing Considerations:**
- Use app.run_test() for async widget testing
- Mock database calls for ConversationList
- Verify message passing between widgets
- Test reactive property updates

**Implementation Hints:**
- Ensure widgets are properly mounted before assertions
- Use pilot.pause() for reactive updates to propagate
- Mock file system operations for FileChip tests
- Verify event/message handlers are connected
